fulltext:
TRAN LU ANH THU
ADMINISTRATOR
 tranluanhthu@gmail.com
  0962294830
  Hochiminh, Vietnam
OBJECTIVE
Looking for a position that will enable me to use my strong organizational skills, experience, and ability to work
well with people. Besides, I would like to get a chance in order to learn more, accomplish my knowledge and
speciality. In the next 2 years, I set target myself to become  a proficient employee in the field of operation and
processing
About me:
I am serious and enthusiastic on work, I would like to apply for an administrator position or customer service. I am
able to care  and satisfy customer in the best way 
I always put the best attitude on jobs that I had been done. Not just to prove to anyone else but to confirm who I
am, to find the true ability as well as personality inside. Hard- working and patient, I am completing myself by
making efforts day by day. Be given an opportunity to work in the active, modern environment of your company will
be my honour. I will try my best to contribute to the firm's development. 
VAN HIEN University
Sep 2013 - Dec 2017
Major: Business English
GPA:3.13/4.0
EDUCATION
KY LONG SERVICE TRADING
INVESTMENT CO.,LTD
June 2018 - Present
Sales Admin
Main responsibilities:
- Respond to incoming phones and email
- Gather market and customer's information
- Make accurate, rapid cost calculations and provide customers with
quotations.
- Paperwork related
MAT BAO CORPORATION
Oct 2017 - Mar 2018
Customer Service Officer
Main responsibilities:
- Open customer accounts by recording account information
- Resolve product or service problems by clarifying the customer's complaint;
determining the cause of the problem
- Select and explaining the best solution to solve the problem; expedite
correction or adjustment; follow up to ensure resolution.
SHANE ENGLISH SCHOOL
Sep 2016 - Present
Teaching Assistant (Part-time)
Main responsibilities:
- Get the classroom ready for lessons and clearing away afterwards
- Help children who need extra support
- Help teachers manage class behaviour
- Look after children who are upset or unwell
- Help teachers prepare materials that match development need
WORK EXPERIENCE
Achievements and skills gained: 
- The ability to build good relationships with children, teachers and parents
- The ability to manage children and cope with challenging behaviour
- Organisational, planning and IT skills
CARGO RUSH
INTERNATIONAL CO., LTD
Nov 2016 - Feb 2017
Intern
Main responsibilities:
- Perform works related to transportation and freight forwarding.
- Transport and forward purchase internal/ external by road, river, sea and
air.
- Import/export activities entrusted to other companies, economic
organizationsunder the company’s function and powers.
- Implementing services related to delivery.
Achievements and skills gained:
Completed my internship with news skills
- Clerical
- Paperwork
- Written Communication
- Logistics, Supply Chain Management
- Get more knowledge
PRIVATE HOUSE
June 2014 - Feb 2015
Part-time tutor
Main responsibilities:
- Teach English for kids, student grade 1,2,3
Achievements and skills gained: 
- Improve English skills, practise communication and others good behaviors
(more patient, more active)
2015
CEFR Level C1 issued by Van Hien University
2017
Computer science certificate level B issued by Van Hien University
2019
Certificate of Finance and Banking issued by University of Economics Ho Chi
Minh City
CERTIFICATIONS
